document_data.name: Orbos Husteem
document_data.home: [[Waterdeep]], [[Sword Coast North]]{{Cite dungeon/126/Vampires of Waterdeep: Blood of Malar}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Orbos Husteem''' was a [[Chondathan]] human and the patriarch of the [[House Husteem|Husteem]] noble house of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Personality: He was well aware of his brother [[Orlpar Husteem|Orlpar's]] illegal activity and attempted to keep him in check.
